body: Revolting. Possibly fake. My dog has a chicken allergy so I generally buy Purina One in either beef or lamb and rice. When a bag arrives I transfer it into a sealed bin with a large scoop and did so today when this bag arrived.While scooping and transferring came across two very large golf-ball sized lumps. They were dark in color and exceptionally greasy. I have never had something like this in either Purina One or any other brand of dog food over my many years of being a dog owner. I wonder what the providence of this dog food actually is because the greasy feeling of these big chunks is not normal.I'd send it back for a refund but I've already opened the bag and transferred it to the bin. I'm dumping this entire batch and this is the last time I purchase dog food from Amazon as I don't trust where they're getting it. At least in a store I know it's being supplied directly from Purina.

body: NOT 4 4lb bags, you only get 1 4lb bag! This review is for  Purina ONE Natural Dry Dog Food, SmartBlend Lamb & Rice Formula - (4) 4 lb. Bags. First of all this listing is VERY misleading. It appears like you will receive four 4lb bags of this food but in reality you only will receive one 4lb bag. The title of the listing, the about this item and the pictures all say you will receive four of the 4lb bags of the food. No where does it say one but if you read the reviews, the reviewers are also saying they only received one so it must be an error in the listing itself.I have a large boxer/german shepherd mix dog and in her older age she has become very picky with the food she eats. We decided to try this dog food for her and she likes it! She normally likes to have a topper or some wet food mixed in with her dry food and this one is the same way. She doesn't like it enough to just eat it plain. The first few ingredients are lamb, rice flour, whole grain corn, and chicken by-product meal. These are not the best ingredients and the ingredients list here is very long but at least lamb is the first ingredient. This is also crafted in the USA which is a plus This is reputable dog food brand as well. My biggest issue here is the price and listing errors. This is not worth $30 for just a 4 pound bag. If it was actually four 4 pound bags then it would be more reasonable at $30 for 16 pounds of food. Purchase at your own risk!

body: A Healthy Food Our Dog LOVES! Our 8 year old bichon frise, Mac, has been eating Purina One dry dog food for some time.  He LOVES the salmon flavor, however, it suddenly vanished from the grocery store shelves.  So I got him this bag of Purina One Lamb and Rice.  When I first poured it into his bowl, he came running from another room and made a beeline for it.  He stopped, sniffed the food and walked away without trying it. An hour or so later, he was back.  This time, he tried the food. And continued to eat more and more until he emptied his food bowl! lol. He's a HUGE fan of Purina One lamb and rice dry dog food. I love that he loves it and it makes him happy.  I also love that LAMB is the first and main ingredient in this dog food.  Its high in Omega 6 fatty acids which help the brain, skin and hair growth, as well as bone health and is also packed with important vitamins and minerals.  And he LOVES it! Our family loves this dog SO much.  We love to spoil him and give him the best life possible. One way to do that is to give him dog food that will help him stay healthy and happy.  He WILL continue to eat Purina One.  And I will continue to feed him lamb & rice, however,  I did contact Purina via email about the salmon dog food and was told production had stopped for a bit but has now resumed.  When salmon Purina One returns to the store, I will alternate between that and salmon for Mac's dog food.

This seems to land in a decent price range with decent ingredients, my dog likes it, and it's easy to find. We've tried the other flavors, but the lamb is her favorite. She eats it with far more gusto than any other brand and any other flavor. It has what looks like pieces of jerky in it, and she really goes after those.  Anyhow, my dog gives this one 2 dew claws up.
